H0.text: Wolframite is the most abundant ore of which metal called wolfram in Swedish? Having the chemical symbol W and Atomic Number 74 it is widely used in light bulbs and X Ray tubes.. Molybdenum

H1.text: Wolframite is the most abundant ore of which metal called wolfram in Swedish? Having the chemical symbol W and Atomic Number 74 it is widely used in light bulbs and X Ray tubes.. Titanium

H2.text: Wolframite is the most abundant ore of which metal called wolfram in Swedish? Having the chemical symbol W and Atomic Number 74 it is widely used in light bulbs and X Ray tubes.. Rhenium

H3.text: Wolframite is the most abundant ore of which metal called wolfram in Swedish? Having the chemical symbol W and Atomic Number 74 it is widely used in light bulbs and X Ray tubes.. Tungston

A4.text: Its important ores include scheelite and wolframite, the latter lending the element its alternative name.

A5.text: Wolframite is iron–manganese tungstate (Fe,Mn)WO4, a solid solution of the two minerals ferberite (FeWO4) and hübnerite (MnWO4).
